description: This file defines the CreatePollFragment class, an Android Fragment responsible for rendering the UI to create a new poll, handling user input for poll title and options, and submitting the poll data through the PollService.

classes.name: CreatePollFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment that provides UI and logic for creating a new poll with multiple options.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout, initializes UI components, and sets up event listeners for adding options and submitting the poll.

methods.name: addOptionInput
methods.description: Creates a new EditText input for poll options, optionally pre-filled with text.

methods.name: submitPoll
methods.description: Collects user input, validates the data, and calls PollService to create the poll, handling success or failure.
